{{Infobox_Broadcast | | call_letters = DXAS-TV (ABS-CBN TV 4 Davao)| | station_logo = [[Image:ABS-CBN logo.svg|200px]] | station_slogan = In The Service of The Filipino Worldwide| | station_branding = ''ABS-CBN TV 4 Davao''| | analog = 4 ([[VHF]])| digital = | other_chs = | | affiliations = [[ABS-CBN]]| | owner = [[ABS-CBN|ABS-CBN Broadcasting Corporation]]| | founded = 1964| | location = [[Davao City]]| | sister_stations = [[DXAB-TV]] ([[Studio 23]])| | former_affiliations = [[Associated Broadcasting Company|Associated Broadcasting Corporation]] (1964-1972)
[[GMA Network]] (1974-1986) | effective_radiated_power = 100 Kilowatts | homepage = [http://www.abs-cbn.com www.abs-cbn.com]| }} '''DXAS-TV''', channel 4, is the sister station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] of [[ABS-CBN|ABS-CBN Broadcasting Corporation]]. Its studio and transmitter are located at the ABS-CBN Broadcasting Complex,Shrine Hills, Matina, [[Davao City]]. ==ABS-CBN 4 Local Programs== *[[Gikan sa Masa, Para sa Masa]] *[[Kapamilya Winner Ka]] *[[Maayong Buntag, Mindanao]] *[[Mag TV Na Sadya Ta]] *[[TV Patrol Southern Mindanao]] ==Defunct Programs== *[[Amor Chicko]] (simulcast along with ABS-CBN Visayas & Mindanao) *[[Campus Idols]] *[[Dinhing Dapita Sadya]] *[[For Life Presents]] (simulcast along with ABS-CBN Visayas & Mindanao) *[[Halo-Halo Sunday Specials]] *[[Kapamilya Sabado Party]] *[[Little Big Star|Little Big Star Davao]] *[[Milyonaryong Mini]] *[[Okiddo]] *[[SBD Jam]] (formerly Sabado Jam) *[[Saranghe]] *[[Summer Sunshine (Philippine TV Series)|Summer Sunshine]] ==Notable anchors== *[[Nikki Bacolod]] *[[Alex Santos]] ==See also== *[[DXRR (Davao City)|DXRR-FM]] *[[DXAB]] *[[DWWX-TV]] *[[ABS-CBN Broadcasting Corporation]] {{Philippines-tv-stub}} {{Metro Davao TV}} {{ABS-CBN Mindanao}} [[Category:ABS-CBN stations| ]] [[Category:Television in Davao City|DXAS-TV]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1964]] [[ceb:DXAS-TV]]
